```{ojs}
// 1. Input field for user message
viewof textInput = Inputs.text({
  label: "Enter your message",
  value: "Bonjour Pier"
})

// 3. Mutable variable initialized with input value
mutable message = textInput;

// 4. Display the current message
html`<p><strong>RT Message:</strong> ${mutable message}</p>`

// 5. Button to manually override the message
viewof updateButton = Inputs.button("Say Salut instead")

// 6. Manual update triggered by button click
updateButton; 
mutable message = "Salut Pier"
```
